title: f and g from properties part - b

content.description:
Let f and g be functions that are differentiable for all real numbers x and that have the following properties.

f ′ (x)= f (x)−g (x)

g′ (x)= g (x)−f (x)

f(0) =5

g(0) =1
content.question: Find f(x) and g(x) . Show your work.

frqParts.text: Find f(x) and g(x) . Show your work.

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
